===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[gather]], to [[assemble]]
# to [[put]] in [[order]], to [[sort out]]
# to [[fix]], to [[repair]]
# [[orderly]], [[neat]], [[tidy]]
# [[whole]], [[entire]], [[all]], [[complete]]
#: {{zh-x|整 棟 樓 的 人 都 在 睡覺。|All the people in the building are sleeping.}}

#: {{zh-x|下午 三 點 整|exactly three o'clock p.m.}}

# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} to [[do]]
#: {{zh-x|這 可 咋整 啊？|What do I '''do'''?|M-NE}}

#: {{zh-x|整 幾個 小菜|to '''prepare''' some side dishes|M-NE}}
#: {{zh-x|番茄 應該 點 整？|How do I prepare tomatoes?|C}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin|Cantonese}} to turn something from one state into another

#: {{zh-x|整大|to enlarge|C}}
